comments:
Is it worth reporting these sorts of errors?  

This error came up while loading some code from CVS.  All I have is the stack 
trace information below and no specific scenario to reproduce it.

eclipse.buildId=I200406101200
java.version=1.4.2_04
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US

Error Jun 10, 2004 16:14:48.606 An internal error occurred during: "Decoration 
Calculation".
java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.ui.internal.decorators.DecorationBuilder.applyResult
(DecorationBuilder.java:130)
at org.eclipse.ui.internal.decorators.DecorationScheduler$1.run
(DecorationScheduler.java:272)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:66)

It is defiantely worth it - the line number on the stack trace is always 
helpful. Thanks for taking the time.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 66563 ***
